comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:7.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0
Build ID: 20110816154714

Steps to reproduce:

go to http://azathioprine.digisnap.bplaced.net/bigbuffers
it looks quite corrupted with angle, with native gl it works


Actual results:

all vertex and index buffers are put into one big buffer (i.e. two buffers). the vertex buffers use byte and short formats. with float it works. i took care of the alignment but it seems ok, it also works with native gl. the problem seems to occur not always, some scenes are ok. i guess the problem starts at a given offset inside the big buffer. also note that i pass arrays to gl.uniform4fv that are larger than what is needed by the shaders.

this bug is also filed to the angle project as issue 213 (http://code.google.com/p/angleproject/issues/detail?id=213)
it would be great if it could resolved for firefox 7 final.


Expected results:

expected is http://azathioprine.digisnap.bplaced.net
or http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_wrvKRNn0rU
